content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Maryam Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I do not have an exact number to share with you.
name: Evaluator

content: I understand that you did not agree on a final price. Can you tell me why you were unable to reach an agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt

content: We were unable to reach an agreement because Maryam and I had different expectations regarding the rental price. She was looking for a lower price, while I was willing to pay more. We could not find a middle ground that we were both satisfied with.
name: Evaluator

content: Understood. Is there anything else you would like to add regarding the negotiation process or the potential tenant?
name: Peter Schmidt

content: No, I think that covers it. Thank you for your time.
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you for your time as well. Good luck with your future negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt
